alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 5:52AM CDT until July 17 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Union County in south central Iowa... Eastern Adams County in southwestern Iowa... Southern Adair County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 551 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bridgewater, or 8 miles southwest of Greenfield, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Creston, Greenfield, Green Valley Lake, Afton, Fontanelle, Orient, Prescott, Bridgewater, Cromwell, Kent, Creston Municipal Airport, Greenfield Municipal Airport, Nodaway Park and Green Valley Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
